journal-title-group.journal-title: Blumea - Biodiversity, Evolution And Biogeography of Plants

title-group.article-title: Additions to Horsfieldia (Myristicaceae) including four new species

name.string-name: De Wilde, W J J O

abstract.p: New facts about various of the hundred species recognized in the recent revision of the Asian-Malesian genus Horsfieldia (Myristicaceae), as well as the description of four new species in this genus (H. urceolata, H. coryandra, H. elongata, H. discolor) are presented.
